ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 69
ygData.msgSnippet: You d be surprised how quickly you get your health back if you party with a cleric.  They can heal you up in no time.  Bards work well too. You say no one will
ygData.messageBody:
You'd be surprised how quickly you get your health back if you party with a
cleric. They can heal you up in no time. Bards work well too.

You say no one will group with you? Well, try asking. I was on with my
cleric (level 12) tonight for several hours and could not find a tank to
group with me. I saw one warrior that was my level that was soloing. I old
him we should group up, but he said he preferred to solo so he wouldn't have
to share the loot.

There was also a higher-up group that was asking for a tank for over an
hour.

Why does no one want to group? Instead of grouping, you want faster hp
regen. This will make it easier to solo and reduce the need for a healer in
the group.

Verdant wanted a game where complementary classes could work together to
perform better. I don't think Verdant will ever make it easier for a class
to solo. If anything, other classes might be altered to reduce their solo
capability.

Wayne



> Date: Thu, 17 Jun 1999 11:23:55 -0500
> From: "John Cynkar" <ref145@...>
> Subject: This would help a bit...
>
> Personally, i feel that warriors should have a sleeping ability, but not
to the extent that all goes black. It should be just like medditate, exit
when you want, and you can still type, just you can't see what is going on.
So, a mediate for warriors is the one thing that will help a lot, well thats
what i think. It just takes me too long to get back all that health...
>
> Dubas of the 17th rank
> ~Mithaniel Marr~
